verses.verse: Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>summoned<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H622>"Assemble<s%> yourselves that I may <S%H5046>tell<s%> you <S%H834>what<s%> shall <S%H7122>befall<s%> you in the <S%H3117>days<s%> to <S%H319>come.<s%>
<S%H6908>"Gather<s%> together and <S%H8085>hear,<s%> O <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> And <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> your father.

<S%H7205>"Reuben,<s%> you are my first-born; My <S%H3581>might<s%> and the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of my <S%H202>strength,<s%> <S%H3499>Preeminent<s%> in <S%H7613>dignity<s%> and <S%H3499>preeminent<s%> in <S%H5794>power.<s%>

<S%H6349>"Uncontrolled<s%> as <S%H4325>water,<s%> you shall not <S%H3498>have<s%> <S%H3498>preeminence,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> you <S%H5927>went<s%> up to your father's <S%H4904>bed;<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> you <S%H2490>defiled<s%> [it] – he <S%H5927>went<s%> up to my <S%H3326>couch.<s%>
<S%H8095>"Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%> are <S%H251>brothers;<s%> Their <S%H4380>swords<s%> are <S%H3627>implements<s%> of <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

"Let my <S%H5315>soul<s%> not <S%H935>enter<s%> into their <S%H5475>council;<s%> Let not my <S%H9202>glory<s%> be <S%H3161>united<s%> with their <S%H6951>assembly;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> in their <S%H639>anger<s%> they <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> And in their self-will they <S%H9432>lamed<s%> <S%H7794>oxen.<s%>

<S%H779>"Cursed<s%> be their <S%H639>anger,<s%> for it is <S%H5794>fierce;<s%> And their <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> for it is <S%H7185>cruel.<s%> I will <S%H2505>disperse<s%> them in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3063>"Judah,<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> you; Your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be on the <S%H6203>neck<s%> of your <S%H340>enemies;<s%> Your father's <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to you.

<S%H3063>"Judah<s%> is a <S%H9030>lion<s%>'s <S%H1482>whelp;<s%> From the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> you have <S%H5927>gone<s%> up. He <S%H3766>couches,<s%> he <S%H7257>lies<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> as a <S%H3833>lion,<s%> And as a lion, <S%H4310>who<s%> dares <S%H6965>rouse<s%> him up?

"The <S%H7626>scepter<s%> shall not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> the ruler's <S%H2710>staff<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7886>Shiloh<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> And to him [shall be] the <S%H3349>obedience<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

"He <S%H631>ties<s%> [his] <S%H5895>foal<s%> to the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> And his donkey's <S%H1121>colt<s%> to the <S%H9634>choice<s%> <S%H9634>vine;<s%> He <S%H3526>washes<s%> his <S%H3830>garments<s%> in <S%H3196>wine,<s%> And his <S%H5497>robes<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes.<s%>
"His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H2447>dull<s%> from <S%H3196>wine,<s%> And his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> from <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

<S%H2074>"Zebulun<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> at the <S%H3220>seashore<s%><S%H2348>;<s%> And he [shall be] a <S%H2348>haven<s%> for <S%H591>ships,<s%> And his <S%H3411>flank<s%> [shall be] <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon.<s%>
<S%H3485>"Issachar<s%> is a <S%H1634>strong<s%> <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> <S%H7257>Lying<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4942>sheepfolds.<s%>

"When he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that a <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H4496>place<s%> was <S%H2896>good<s%> And that the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H5276>pleasant,<s%> He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%> to <S%H5445>bear<s%> [burdens], And <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5647>slave<s%> at <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>labor.<s%>
<S%H1835>"Dan<s%> shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> As <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H1835>"Dan<s%> shall be a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> A <S%H8207>horned<s%> <S%H8207>snake<s%> in the <S%H734>path,<s%> That <S%H5391>bites<s%> the horse's <S%H6119>heels,<s%> So that his <S%H7392>rider<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> <S%H268>backward.<s%>
"For Thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%> I <S%H6960>wait,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"As for <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H1416>raiders<s%> shall <S%H1464>raid<s%> him, But he shall <S%H1464>raid<s%> [at] their <S%H6119>heels.<s%>
"As for <S%H836>Asher,<s%> his <S%H3899>food<s%> shall be <S%H8082>rich,<s%> And he shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H4574>dainties.<s%>
<S%H5321>"Naphtali<s%> is a <S%H355>doe<s%> <S%H7971>let<s%> <S%H7971>loose,<s%> He <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H8233>beautiful<s%> <S%H561>words.<s%>

<S%H3130>"Joseph<s%> is a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough,<s%> A <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough<s%> by a <S%H5869>spring;<s%> [Its] <S%H1323>branches<s%> <S%H6805>run<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> a <S%H7791>wall.<s%>
"The <S%H1167>archers<s%> <S%H2671><s%> <S%H4843>bitterly<s%> attacked him, And <S%H7232>shot<s%> [at him] and <S%H7852>harassed<s%> him;

But his <S%H7198>bow<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> <S%H386>firm,<s%> And his <S%H2220>arms<s%> were <S%H6339>agile,<s%> From the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> (From <S%H8033>there<s%> is the <S%H7462>Shepherd,<s%> the <S%H68>Stone<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>),

From the <S%H410>God<s%> of your father who <S%H1>helps<s%> you, And by the <S%H5826>Almighty<s%> who <S%H7706>blesses<s%> you [With] <S%H1288>blessings<s%> of <S%H1293>heaven<s%> <S%H8064>above,<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921>Blessings<s%> of the <S%H1293>deep<s%> that <S%H8415>lies<s%> <S%H7257>beneath,<s%> <S%H8478>Blessings<s%> of the <S%H1293>breasts<s%> and of the <S%H7699>womb.<s%>

"The <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of your father Have <S%H1>surpassed<s%> the <S%H1396>blessings<s%> of my <S%H1293>ancestors<s%> Up to the <S%H2029>utmost<s%> <S%H8379>bound<s%> of the <S%H8379>everlasting<s%> <S%H5769>hills;<s%> May they be on the <S%H1389>head<s%> of <S%H7218>Joseph,<s%> And on the <S%H3130>crown<s%> of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of the <S%H6936>one<s%> <S%H5139>distinguished<s%> among his <S%H5139>brothers.<s%>

<S%H1144>"Benjamin<s%> is a <S%H2963>ravenous<s%> <S%H2061>wolf;<s%> In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> he <S%H398>devours<s%> the <S%H5706>prey,<s%> And in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> he <S%H2505>divides<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>"

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H834>what<s%> their father <S%H1>said<s%> to them when he <S%H1696>blessed<s%> them. He <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, <S%H1288>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with the <S%H376>blessing<s%> appropriate to him.

Then he <S%H6680>charged<s%> them and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "I am about to be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to my <S%H9415>people;<s%> <S%H6912>bury<s%> me with my fathers in the <S%H1>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H4631>field<s%> of <S%H7704>Ephron<s%> the <S%H6085>Hittite,<s%>

in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> along with the <S%H7704>field<s%> from <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> for a <S%H6913>burial<s%> <S%H272>site.<s%>

<S%H8033>"There<s%> they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> I <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> –
the <S%H7704>field<s%> and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in it, <S%H4735>purchased<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%> "

When <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H6680>charging<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> he <S%H622>drew<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> into the <S%H4296>bed<s%> and <S%H1478>breathed<s%> his <S%H1478>last,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H9415>people.<s%>
